auth.failed: These credentials do not match our records.
auth.throttle: Too many login attempts. Please try again in :seconds seconds.
passwords.sent: We have emailed your password reset link!
passwords.token: This password reset token is invalid.
passwords.user: We can't find a user with that email address.
validation.accepted_if: The :attribute must be accepted when :other is :value.
validation.active_url: The :attribute is not a valid URL.
validation.after: The :attribute must be a date after :date.
validation.after_or_equal: The :attribute must be a date after or equal to :date.
validation.alpha_dash: The :attribute must only contain letters, numbers, dashes and underscores.
validation.alpha_num: The :attribute must only contain letters and numbers.
validation.ascii: The :attribute must only contain single-byte alphanumeric characters and symbols.
validation.before: The :attribute must be a date before :date.
validation.before_or_equal: The :attribute must be a date before or equal to :date.
validation.between.array: The :attribute must have between :min and :max items.
validation.between.file: The :attribute must be between :min and :max kilobytes.
validation.between.string: The :attribute must be between :min and :max characters.
validation.boolean: The :attribute field must be true or false.
validation.can: The :attribute field contains an unauthorized value.
validation.contains: The :attribute field is missing a required value.
validation.date: The :attribute is not a valid date.
validation.date_equals: The :attribute must be a date equal to :date.
validation.date_format: The :attribute does not match the format :format.
validation.declined_if: The :attribute must be declined when :other is :value.
validation.digits_between: The :attribute must be between :min and :max digits.
validation.distinct: The :attribute field has a duplicate value.
validation.doesnt_end_with: The :attribute may not end with one of the following: :values.
validation.doesnt_start_with: The :attribute may not start with one of the following: :values.
validation.email: The :attribute must be a valid email address.
validation.ends_with: The :attribute must end with one of the following: :values.
validation.extensions: The :attribute field must have one of the following extensions: :values.
validation.filled: The :attribute field must have a value.
validation.gt.array: The :attribute must have more than :value items.
validation.gt.file: The :attribute must be greater than :value kilobytes.
validation.gt.string: The :attribute must be greater than :value characters.
validation.gte.array: The :attribute must have :value items or more.
validation.gte.file: The :attribute must be greater than or equal to :value kilobytes.
validation.gte.numeric: The :attribute must be greater than or equal to :value.
validation.gte.string: The :attribute must be greater than or equal to :value characters.
validation.hex_color: The :attribute field must be a valid hexadecimal color.
validation.in_array: The :attribute field does not exist in :other.
validation.ip: The :attribute must be a valid IP address.
validation.ipv4: The :attribute must be a valid IPv4 address.
validation.ipv6: The :attribute must be a valid IPv6 address.
validation.json: The :attribute must be a valid JSON string.
validation.list: The :attribute field must be a list.
validation.lt.array: The :attribute must have less than :value items.
validation.lt.file: The :attribute must be less than :value kilobytes.
validation.lt.string: The :attribute must be less than :value characters.
validation.lte.array: The :attribute must not have more than :value items.
validation.lte.file: The :attribute must be less than or equal to :value kilobytes.
validation.lte.numeric: The :attribute must be less than or equal to :value.
validation.lte.string: The :attribute must be less than or equal to :value characters.
validation.mac_address: The :attribute must be a valid MAC address.
validation.max.array: The :attribute must not have more than :max items.
validation.max.file: The :attribute must not be greater than :max kilobytes.
validation.max.numeric: The :attribute must not be greater than :max.
validation.max.string: The :attribute must not be greater than :max characters.
validation.max_digits: The :attribute must not have more than :max digits.
validation.mimes: The :attribute must be a file of type: :values.
validation.mimetypes: The :attribute must be a file of type: :values.
validation.min.array: The :attribute must have at least :min items.
validation.min.file: The :attribute must be at least :min kilobytes.
validation.min.string: The :attribute must be at least :min characters.
validation.min_digits: The :attribute must have at least :min digits.
validation.missing_if: The :attribute field must be missing when :other is :value.
validation.missing_unless: The :attribute field must be missing unless :other is :value.
validation.missing_with: The :attribute field must be missing when :values is present.
validation.missing_with_all: The :attribute field must be missing when :values are present.
validation.multiple_of: The :attribute must be a multiple of :value.
validation.password.letters: The :attribute must contain at least one letter.
validation.password.mixed: The :attribute must contain at least one uppercase and one lowercase letter.
validation.password.numbers: The :attribute must contain at least one number.
validation.password.symbols: The :attribute must contain at least one symbol.
validation.password.uncompromised: The given :attribute has appeared in a data leak. Please choose a different :attribute.
validation.present_if: The :attribute field must be present when :other is :value.
validation.present_unless: The :attribute field must be present unless :other is :value.
validation.present_with: The :attribute field must be present when :values is present.
validation.present_with_all: The :attribute field must be present when :values are present.
validation.prohibited_if: The :attribute field is prohibited when :other is :value.
validation.prohibited_unless: The :attribute field is prohibited unless :other is in :values.
validation.prohibits: The :attribute field prohibits :other from being present.
validation.required_array_keys: The :attribute field must contain entries for: :values.
validation.required_if: The :attribute field is required when :other is :value.
validation.required_if_accepted: The :attribute field is required when :other is accepted.
validation.required_if_declined: The :attribute field is required when :other is declined.
validation.required_unless: The :attribute field is required unless :other is in :values.
validation.required_with: The :attribute field is required when :values is present.
validation.required_with_all: The :attribute field is required when :values are present.
validation.required_without: The :attribute field is required when :values is not present.
validation.required_without_all: The :attribute field is required when none of :values are present.
validation.starts_with: The :attribute must start with one of the following: :values.
validation.timezone: The :attribute must be a valid timezone.
validation.url: The :attribute must be a valid URL.
validation.ulid: The :attribute must be a valid ULID.
validation.uuid: The :attribute must be a valid UUID.
public.login_header_caption: Welcome back! Please enter your details.
public.inactive_account_message: Your account has been deactivated. Please contact support for more information or assistance.
public.forgot_password_caption: No worries, we'll send you reset instructions.
public.check_your_email_caption: We've sent a reset password link to
public.choose_password_caption: Make sure your password fulfil the criteria.
public.password_rule: Must be at least 8 characters containing uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and symbols.
public.password_reset_caption: Your password has been successfully reset. You can now log in with your new password.
public.greeting_caption: Ready to manage and optimize your platform? Let's get to work!
public.empty_pending_request_message: There are currently no withdrawal requests awaiting your approval. Please check back later or refresh the page to see if any new requests have been submitted.
public.name: Name
public.remarks_caption: Please enter a remark to reject the withdrawal request. If left blank, the default remark will be used.
public.file_size_limit: Maximum file size is 10 MB. Supported file types are .jpg and .png.
public.account_have_balance: Unable to delete: This account still has a remaining balance.
public.activate_member_caption: Are you sure you want to activate this member? This will grant them access to the platform.
public.deactivate_member_caption: Are you sure you want to deactivate this member? This action will restrict their access.
public.delete_member_desc: Are you sure you want to delete this member? This action cannot be undone.
public.set_rebate_message: Great job transferring the upline! Now, please proceed to set the rebate for the new hierarchy.
public.transfer_same_upline_warning: User is already under this upline.
public.toast_create_member_success: You've successfully created a new member!
public.toast_transfer_upline_success: You've successfully transferred the upline for your member!
public.toast_balance_adjustment_success: Trading account balance has been adjusted.
public.toast_credit_adjustment_success: Trading account credit has been adjusted.
public.kyc_verification_desc: If the uploaded KYC image doesn't meet the requirements, you can request a new upload from user.
public.delete_trading_account_desc: Are you sure you want to delete this trading account #:account? This action cannot be undone.
public.empty_member_message: No members have been added yet. Please check back later or create a new member to get started.
public.empty_agent_message: There are currently no agents listed. Please check back later.
public.toast_update_member_info_success: You've successfully updated the member info.
public.toast_update_crypto_wallet_info_s: You've successfully updated the crypto wallet info.
public.toast_kyc_upload_request: You've successfully requested a new KYC submission.
public.empty_deposit_record_message: There are no deposit transactions to display at this time. Please check back later for updates.
public.empty_withdrawal_record_message: There are no withdrawal records available at this time. Please check back later for updates.
public.empty_transfer_record_message: There are no transfer records available at this time. Please check back later for updates.
public.empty_rebate_payout_record_messag: There are no rebate payout records available at this time. Please check back later for updates.
public.empty_incentive_payout_record_mes: There are no incentive payout records available at this time. Please check back later for updates.
public.no_sales_team_message: No sales team has been created yet. Start building your first team to get started!
public.mark_settlement_message: Are you sure you want to proceed with the monthly settlement? This action will finalise all transactions for the month.
public.remove_sales_team_message: Are you sure you want to remove this sales team? All members of this sales team will be detached and this action cannot be undone.
public.toast_create_sales_team_success: You've successfully created a new sales team!
public.toast_settlement_already_exists: Settlement already has been marked as completed!
public.toast_mark_settlement_success: You've successfully marked a new settlement!
public.no_agent_found_message: No agents are available. Please add new agents to begin.
public.toast_update_rebate_success_messa: You've successfully updated the rebate details!
public.sales_calculation_mode_caption: Choose whether to calculate sales based on individual performance or group performance.
public.sales_category_caption: Select the category of sales to be used for incentive calculation.
public.set_target_amount_caption: Enter the target amount for the agent to achieve.
public.incentive_caption_trade: Specify the flat incentive amount that will be awarded when the target achieved.
public.incentive_caption: Specify the incentive rate as a percentage.
public.calculation_threshold_caption: Choose the percentage of the target that must be reached before the incentive is calculated.
public.no_incentive_profiles_caption: No incentive profiles have been set up yet. Please create a new profile to get started.
public.delete_incentive_profile_desc: Are you sure you want to delete this incentive profile? This action cannot be undone.
public.toast_create_incentive_profile_su: You've successfully created a new incentive profile!
public.account_information_message: Description will be displayed to user when open new account.
public.activate_account_type_message: Are you sure you want to activate this account type? This will display the account type to user.
public.deactivate_account_type_message: Are you sure you want to deactivate this account type? This action will hide the account type from user.
public.toast_account_type_activated: You've successfully activated the account type!
public.toast_update_account_type_success: You've successfully updated the account type!
public.change_profile_caption: Upload your profile photo here. This will be displayed on your profile.
public.reset_password_caption: Please enter your current password to reset password.
public.delete_account_desc: Once your account is deleted, all your data and resources will be gone forever. Please download anything you want to keep before saying goodbye.
public.delete_account_message: Oh no, we're sorry to see you go! To delete your account, please enter your password.
public.toast_update_profile_success: You've successfully updated your account details!
public.bad_request_desc: It looks like the request couldn't be processed. Let's try again.
public.unauthorized_title: Hold Up! You're Not Logged In
public.unauthorized_desc: Please log in to access this content.
public.forbidden_desc: You don't have permission to view this page. Maybe try a different route?
public.page_not_found_desc: We couldn't find the page you're looking for. Let's get you back on track.
public.request_timeout_desc: The server took too long to respond. Let's give it another go.
public.internal_server_error_desc: We're working on it. Please check back soon.
public.bad_gateway_desc: The server encountered a problem. Let's refresh and try again.
public.service_unavailable_desc: We're temporarily offline for maintenance. Please check back later.
public.gateway_timeout_desc: The server took too long to respond. Try reloading the page.
public.display_name_caption: This name will appear on your post. Choose a name that represents you well.
public.subject: Subject
public.empty_agents: There are no agents to display. Please upgrade a member to become an agent.
public.grant_posting_permission_desc: Are you sure you want to grant this agent permission to post in the forum?
public.remove_posting_permission_desc: Are you sure you want to remove this agent's permission to post in the forum?
public.delete_post_desc: Are you sure you want to delete this post? This action cannot be undone.
public.no_posts_yet_caption: There are no posts available. Start by creating a new one!
public.at_least_one_field_required: At least one field are required
public.toast_create_post_success: You've successfully created a new post!
public.activate_admin_role_caption: Are you sure you want to activate this admin role? This will grant their platform access.
public.deactivate_admin_role_caption: Are you sure you want to deactivate this admin role? This action will restrict their access.
public.delete_admin_role_desc: Are you sure you want to delete this admin role? This action cannot be undone.
public.toast_create_admin_role_success: You've successfully created a new admin role!
public.toast_admin_has_activated: You've successfully activated the admin role!
public.empty_admin_role_message: There are no admin roles available at this time. Please create a new role to get started.
